snippet.title: Paladin's Passage Gameplay Trailer 3
snippet.description:
Playtesters wanted...
for the second round of level design and difficulty tuning for our upcoming #UE5 2.5D precision platformer #indiegame, Paladin's Passage on #Steam. Sign-ups open around June 15th.

Our game holds a lot of great gameplay AND has the best technology to back it up:
- Windows, MacOS, Linux and SteamOS/Deck
- DLSS 2 (3 coming when NVIDIA is ready!) and AMD FSR2
- Unlocked framerates
- Fully customizable controller-only AND full keyboard-only modes
- Unreal Engine 5.1 engine (5.2 coming, pending DLSS 3)
- Ultra-wide screen monitor rendering from 720p to 4k resolutions
- Steam cloud sync/save, including cross-platform play
- Steam Workshop with level upload/download
- Steam Achievements and Leaderboards
- Super-fast load times AND skip intros/extros for each level

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1908480
Site: https://paladinspassage.com

Follow Bent Vector Studios:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bent_vector
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bentvector

Explore deep beneath the ancient, ruined city of Delphi. Discover a secret, magical artifact that holds the power to save the Roman Empire. Many have ventured in search of the artifact. None have ever returned. Can you be the first to succeed?
